value:
$WmMPID_フィオーラ,ch03_24_Fiora_F_Normal,Face|No matter how many tears we shed,
the snow will not melt. Better that we
fight for our homeland.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Ah...$k$pTh-this scenery...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Is something wrong, Sharena?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I...remember this place, I think.
That field of flowers is familiar.
Like I've been here before...$k$pMy heart... So many memories...
I can hardly contain myself!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|How would you have memories of
the land of dreams?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|It was a very long time ago... When
I was a just a girl... I don't know how,
but I came here...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oooh! Let me ask you something...$k$pYou used to come here, right? Did
you...play with ljósálfar? Do you...
remember anything at all?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh, yeah! I used to play with other
girls who must've been near my age...
We played hide-and-seek, dress-up...$k$pActually, they might've looked a
bit like Peony... W-were you there,
Peony? Do you remember me?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... Sorry, I don't. I HAVE played
with children in their dreams, but...
I don't think you were one of them!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh... I see.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Well, since if it's children who usually
visit these parts, and it's been at least
10 years since Sharena was a child...$k$pActually...how old are you, Peony?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse! Have you no sense at all?!
It's RUDE to ask a lady her age!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|That's right, Alfonse! You'd do well
to remember that in the future!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I-I'm sorry! I just... I meant nothing
by it! Apologies for any offense...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... Age is how many years have
passed since you were born, right?
I...don't know if I can tell you that.$k$pThe flow of time in Ljósálfheimr is
different than in the waking world...
Plus, one day, I was just here.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You were just...in Ljósálfheimr
one day? Suddenly?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|That's right! I was brought to life
through the power of Dream-King
Freyr and his sister, Lady Freyja.$k$pAnd by them my life was given its
purpose—to give good dreams to
everyone, everywhere.$k$p$Sbs150|
